word_group.brief_definition: 政府招聘；政府征募新成员
人员招聘；官员招募；警官招募

bilingual.source: The army is looking to recruit young men and women.
bilingual.target: 军队正在招募年轻男女。

bilingual.source: The company plans to recruit new employees next month.
bilingual.target: 公司计划下个月招募新员工。

bilingual.source: They need to recruit more volunteers for the event.
bilingual.target: 他们需要为活动招募更多志愿者。

bilingual.source: The hospital needs to recruit volunteers to assist patients.
bilingual.target: 医院需要招募志愿者来协助病人。

bilingual.source: The pimp tried to recruit new girls for his business.
bilingual.target: 那个拉皮条者试图为他的生意招募新女孩。

bilingual.source: We should recruit some experts to help with the project.
bilingual.target: 我们应该招募一些专家来帮助这个项目。

bilingual.source: The school is trying to recruit more teachers for the new semester.
bilingual.target: 学校正在为新学期招募更多教师。

bilingual.source: We plan to recruit volunteers for a community cleanup next month.
bilingual.target: 我们计划在下个月招募志愿者进行社区清洁。

bilingual.source: The solution to great team performance stems from a willingness to recruit others.
bilingual.target: 优秀团队绩效的解决方案源于愿意招募其他人。

bilingual.source: They work hard to recruit creative people.
bilingual.target: 他们都尽力招募创造性人才。

yingyinNormal.en: You sent me to recruit him, way back when, did you know then what was gonna happen?
yingyinNormal.zh: 之前是你指派我去招募他，你那时知道现在会发生这种事吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Recruit former agents from other nations, supply them with a new identity and use them to surgically remove our enemies, both at home and abroad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 招募其他国家退役的特工，给他们新的身份，利用他们除掉我们国内外的敌人。

yingyinNormal.en: You recruit other hosts to help you. Then you're to make your way to the train.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你召集了其他接待员帮助你，然后你上了火车。

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. Then Howard got a tip from a CI that a gang was gonna put a recruit on the inside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，霍华德从一个线人那里得到消息，有黑帮要安插学员进来。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's get started! The recruit who does best will win the honor of killing his first dragon in front of the entire village.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开始吧！表现最好的学员将赢得在全村族人面前屠杀他第一只龙的荣耀。

yingyinNormal.en: Ladies and gentlemammals, 14 mammals went missing and all 14 have been found by our newest recruit, who will speak to you in a moment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 雌性雄性们，失踪的14名动物现已全数找回，找到他们的是下面这位新警官。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 征募; 召集; 招聘

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: enlist someone in the armed forces, or in an organization
sense_info_list.zh: 征募; 召集; 招聘

examination_example.sentence: Other industries are <highlight>recruiting</highlight> them with similar or better pay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他行业也在以类似或更好的薪酬招聘他们。

examination_example.sentence: Colleges and universities have pushed for decades to <highlight>recruit</highlight> more of them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几十年来，学院和大学一直在努力招收更多的学生。

examination_example.sentence: In South Africa, an HIV-prevention initiative known as LoveLife <highlight>recruits</highlight> young people to promote safe sex among their peers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在南非，一项被称为“热爱生命”的艾滋病预防计划招募年轻人，在其同龄人中推广安全性行为。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The solution to great team performance stems from a willingness to <highlight>recruit</highlight> others who could direct their passion towards the third phase of entrepreneurialism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 优秀团队绩效的解决方案。，源于愿意招募那些能够将他们的激情引向创业第三阶段的人。

examination_example.sentence: Then there's the area's remoteness—at 502,000 square kilometers—it can sometimes make <highlight>recruiting</highlight> staff a challenge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，该地区地处偏远，面积为50.2万平方公里。这有时会使招聘员工变得很困难。

examination_example.sentence: First, <highlight>recruiting</highlight> high quality staff in a time of skills shortages in IT, and the issue of retaining staff once they've been recruited and trained.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，在IT行业技能短缺的情况下招聘高质量的员工，以及在招聘和培训员工后留住他们的问题。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 征募; 召集; 招聘

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
